summary: This is an email chain from January 2020 between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding approval for foreign travel to Stockholm, Sweden, to interview a witness in connection with the Epstein investigation. The travel was planned for February 3-7, 2020.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial travel request email, seeking approval to travel to Sweden to interview a witness for the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Planned Witness Interview Trip to Sweden
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorneys planned to travel to Stockholm, Sweden, to interview a witness in connection with the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: In January 2020, U.S. Attorney's Office personnel were planning to travel to Sweden in February 2020 to interview a witness for the Epstein investigation.
The travel required internal approval following an international travel checklist.
The email chain shows ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case in early 2020, after Epstein's death in August 2019.
